title: (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU)
(No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU)
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Principal Regulations” means the European Union (Food Intended for Infants 
and Young Children, Food for Special Medical Purposes, and Total Diet 
Replacement for Weight Control) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 425 of 2019); 

“Regulations of 2024” means the European Union (Food Intended for Infants 
and Young Children, Food for Special Medical Purposes, and Total Diet 
Replacement for Weight Control) (Amendment) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 411 
of 2024).

title: (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU)
heading: 3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2(1) of the Principal Regulations (as last amended by 

Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 2024) is hereby amended – 

1 OJ No. L 181, 29.6.2013, p. 35. 
2 OJ L, 2024/2684, 11.10.2024. 
3 OJ L, 2024/2791, 31.10.2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [128] 3 

(a) 

by substituting for the definition of “Annex I to EU Regulation 
2016/127” the following: 

‘“Annex I to EU Regulation 2016/127’ means Annex I to 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/127 of 25 
September 20154 as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2019/828 of 14 March 20195, Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/519 of 14 January 20226,

20237 and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/2684 of

Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/127 of 25 
September 20154 as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2018/561 of 29 January 20188, Commission 
Delegated Regulation 2019/828 of 14 March 20195, Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/519 of 14 January 20226, 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/589 of 10 January 
20237 and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/2684 of 
2 February 20242;”, 

(c) 

by substituting for the definition of “Annex III to EU Regulation

‘“Annex III to EU Regulation 2016/127’ means Annex III to 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/127 of 25 
September 20154 as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2022/519 of 14 January 20226, Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/589 of 10 January 20237 and 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/2684 of 2 
February 20242;”, 

(d) by substituting for the definition of “EU Regulation 2016/127” 

the following: 

‘“EU Regulation 2016/127’ means Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2016/127 of 25 September 20154 as amended by 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2018/561 of 29 January 
20188, Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/828 of 14

of 20 January 20219, Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2021/1041 of 16 April 202110, Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2022/519 of 14 January 20226, Commission Delegated

Regulation (EU) 2023/589 of 10 January 20237 and Commission

(e) 

by substituting for the definition of “EU Regulation 609/2013”

“‘EU Regulation 609/2013’ means Regulation (EU) No. 
609/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 12

(EU) 2017/1091 of 10 April 201711, Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/571 of 20 January 202112, Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/439 of 16 December 202213 and 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/2791 of 29 
January 20243;”, and 

(f) 

by substituting for the definition of “Union list” the following: 

“‘Union list’ means the Union list annexed to EU Regulation 
609/2013 as amended by Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2017/1091 of 10 April 201711, Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/571 of 20 January 202112, Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2023/439 of 16 December 202213 and 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2024/2791 of 29 
January 20243 and which lists the various substances that may be 
added to one or more of the categories of food referred to in 
Regulation 3.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 April, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health.

title: (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further effect to Regulation (EU)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2024/2684 of 2 February 2024 amending Delegated Regulation (EU) 2016/127 
as regards the minimum protein requirements for infant and follow-on formula 
manufactured from hydrolysed protein, and Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2024/2791 of 29 January 2024 amending the Annex to Regulation (EU) 
No 609/2013 of the European Parliament and of the Council to allow the use of 
iron milk caseinate as a source of iron in food for special medical purposes, 
excluding food for infants and young children and in total diet replacement for 
weight control. 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Food Intended for Infants and 
Young Children, Food for Special Medical Purposes, and Total Diet 
Replacement for Weight Control) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 425 of 2019) in the 
manner specified in these Regulations. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Food Intended for 
Infants and Young Children, Food for Special Medical Purposes, and Total Diet 
Replacement for Weight Control) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [128]
